text: Ahh ok, how do you find deliverability?

Hello everyone, please help me with my question about (HubSpot THEMES CHALLENGE 2021). I try to ask question before, but still not clear please help me
 
I have read the rule in SECTION 4 have mention that theme must be available free of charge and without any restriction
<https://HubSpot.devpost.com/rules|https://HubSpot.devpost.com/rules >
4. SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS
(v) Testing: Participants must make their themes available free of charge and without any restriction, for testing, evaluation and use by the Sponsor and Judges during the Contest and until the Judging Period ends.
 
I have check HubSpot asset marketplace theme submit have (free and paid) options, if i choose free options when theme publish i can't change to paid.
------------------------------------------------------------

 My question is:
*- During the HubSpot theme contest my theme submission must be set free of charge in the Asset Marketplace?*
*Or*
*- Should i submit my theme in HubSpot asset marketplace choose paid and set price to $0.00 during contest?*
